servers.description: Example Base Path - Replace example with flyreel for prod

parameters.name: inspection_id
parameters.description: ID of the inspection to update

post.description: Flyreel webhook integrations require a public endpoint. The request will be signed and its origins and content can be verified using the associated public key. To verify a request parse the x-flyreel-signature value in the request header and verify the signature against a JSON stringified verison of the request body. The signature is base64 encoded.

get_inspection_output.name: output
get_inspection_output.description: Sets the output type of the response

limit.name: limit
limit.description: The number of items to return

offset.name: offset
offset.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Sort by expiration, createdAt, carrier_expiration, status or review_completed (eg. ascending = "createdAt", descending = "-createdAt")

carriers.name: carriers
carriers.description: A comma separated list of carrier IDs. This only applies for GET requests where the user's work_on_carrier role is any

status.name: status
status.description: Single string value or comma delimited string (eg. "invited,started")

zip_code.name: zip_code
zip_code.description: URI encoded string - Valid US zipcode or CA postal code

custom_fields.name: custom_fields
custom_fields.description: URI encoded JSON object with key/value pairs for custom fields

list_inspections_output.name: output
list_inspections_output.description: Sets the output type of the response

custom_fields.description: Carrier defined custom fields associated with the inspection

messages.description: Does not include media message types or associate answers

text.example: Does your water heater have an automatic water detection shut-off?

answer.description: null is an acceptable answer value

custom_fields.description: Carrier defined custom fields associated with the inspection

status.description: Statuses may vary depending on messaging service

CreateInspection.description: A JSON object containing inspection details - address1, city, state, zip_code, and country must represent a valid location and phone numbers cannot be fake or they will fail the validation check

conversation.description: Optional conversation ID - default conversation will be used if not provided

phone.description: Customer phone number - must be a valid phone number

expiration.description: Flyreel expiration date - must be at least 5 days greater than the current datetime and less than 365 days from the current datetime

carrier_expiration.description: Carrier expiration date - must be at least 2 days greater than the expiration datetime and less than 367 days from the current datetime

agent_phone.description: Agents phone number - must be a valid phone number

custom_fields.description: Carrier defined custom fields associated with the inspection

UpdateInspection.description: A JSON object containing inspection details - address1, city, state, zip_code, and country must represent a valid location and phone numbers cannot be fake or they will fail the validation check

conversation.description: Optional conversation ID - default conversation will be used if not provided

phone.description: Customer phone number - must be a valid phone number

expiration.description: Flyreel expiration date - must be at least 5 days greater than the current datetime and less than 365 days from the current datetime

carrier_expiration.description: Carrier expiration date - must be at least 2 days greater than the expiration datetime and less than 367 days from the current datetime

agent_phone.description: Agents phone number - must be a valid phone number

custom_fields.description: Carrier defined custom fields associated with the inspection

external_id.description: Empty string if meta.external_id does not exist
